Specimen Type: Whole blood, saliva, or buccal swab
Purpose: To identify genetic variants associated with primary ciliary dyskinesia using next-generation sequencing.
Container: EDTA tube for blood, saliva collection kit, or buccal swab
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, library preparation kit, NGS platform (e.g., Illumina), PCR thermal cycler, Qubit/Bioanalyzer, bioinformatics software
